sqlMap.select: SELECT Buoy_No AS BUOY_NO FROM dbo.TB_AIS21

SELECT count(a.mmsi) FROM SPM.dbo.TB_AIS123 a, SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b where a.MMSI =b.mmsi and a.Latitude > '35.34033442007605' and a.Latitude < '35.74038185534101' and a.Longitude > '129.34066772460938' and a.Longitude < '130.21820068359375'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.mmsi, a.TimeStampK as timestampk, a.Latitude as latitude, a.Longitude as longitude, a.theading, ISNULL((select top 1 ShipName from SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b where a.MMSI =b.mmsi order by b.TimeStampK desc), ' ')as shipname FROM $table_nm$ a WHERE 1=1
a.Latitude > #lat2# and a.Latitude < #lat1# and a.Longitude > #lon2# and a.Longitude < #lon1#
a.MMSI like '%$mmsi$%'
) c WHERE 1=1
shipname like '%$shipname$%'
order by mmsi

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.mmsi, min(a.TimeStampK) as min_timestampk, max(a.TimeStampK) as max_timestampk, ISNULL((select top 1 ShipName from SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b where a.MMSI =b.mmsi order by b.TimeStampK desc), ' ')as shipname, ISNULL((select top 1 theading from SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b where a.MMSI =b.mmsi order by b.TimeStampK desc), ' ')as theading FROM $table_nm$ a WHERE 1=1
a.Latitude > #lat2# and a.Latitude < #lat1# and a.Longitude > #lon2# and a.Longitude < #lon1#
a.MMSI like '%$mmsi$%'
GROUP BY a.MMSI) c WHERE 1=1
shipname like '%$shipname$%'
ORDER BY mmsi, shipname

SELECT * FROM (SELECT mmsi, ISNULL((select top 1 ShipName from SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b where a.MMSI =b.mmsi order by b.TimeStampK desc), ' ')as shipname FROM $table_nm$ a) c WHERE 1=1
(shipname LIKE '%$shipname$%' OR mmsi LIKE '%$shipname$%')
GROUP BY mmsi,shipname

SELECT mmsi,shipname,longitude,latitude FROM (SELECT c.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.mmsi, c.ShipName ORDER BY c.TimeStampK DESC) AS rank_no FROM (SELECT a.mmsi, a.Longitude,a.Latitude,a.TimeStampK, a.theading, ISNULL((select top 1 ShipName from SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b where a.MMSI =b.mmsi order by b.TimeStampK desc), ' ')as shipname FROM $table_nm$ a WHERE a.TimeStampK >= DATEADD(MINUTE,-10,GETDATE())) c ) d WHERE rank_no =1 ORDER BY mmsi,shipname

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.mmsi, a.Latitude as latitude, a.Longitude as longitude, a.TimeStampK as timestampk, a.theading, ISNULL((select top 1 ShipName from SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b where a.MMSI =b.mmsi order by b.TimeStampK desc), ' ')as shipname FROM $table_nm$ a WHERE a.MMSI like '%$mmsi$%' AND a.TimeStampK >= DATEADD(MINUTE,-10,GETDATE())) c ORDER BY MMSI, ShipName, TimeStampK

SELECT TOP(1) b.MMSI, b.shipname, b.callsign, b.imonumeric, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.sog, a.cog, a.theading, a.rateturn, a.cstate, b.shiptype, b.dimena+b.dimenb shipsize, b.destitime, b.destination, b.timestampk FROM $table_nm$ a, SPM.dbo.TB_AIS5 b WHERE a.MMSI =b.mmsi AND a.mmsi = #mmsi# ORDER BY timestampk DESC
